name: Gnome Squidling
languages: understands Deep Speech and Gnomish but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The squidling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (2d4 damage) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 7) and must succeed on a DC 7 Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
entries: Melee atk +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} creature {@condition grappled} by the squidling. 27 (5d10 damage) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the squidling kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Tickle {@recharge 5}
entries: The squidling magically emits psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 7 Intelligence saving throw or take 2 (1d4 damage) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The squidling's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 7}). It can innately cast {@spell levitate} at will, requiring no components.
